top_questions.text: Convert / Calculate as per the instruction. [4×1=4] i) (11111101)₂ = (?)₁₆​ ii) (245)₁₀ = (?)₂​ iii) (1010)₂ × (101)₂ = (?)₂​ iv) (101110)₂ ÷ (110)₂

Write a program in QBASIC that asks length, breadth of a room and calculate its area and perimeter. Create a user defined function to calculate area and sub program to calculate perimeter. [4]​ [Hint: Area=L×B, P=2(L+B)]
